alert.note: Alert for Cheshire; Merrimack; Southern Grafton; Sullivan; Western And Central Hillsborough (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 01 at 3:23PM EST until March 02 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 10 AM EST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations up to one inch and ice accumulations around a light glaze. * WHERE...Western and Central Hillsborough, Merrimack, Sullivan, Southern Grafton, and Cheshire Counties. This advisory is mainly for communities at and above 800 feet. * WHEN...From Midnight tonight to 10 AM EST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Difficult travel conditions are possible due to icy road conditions. Even light snowfall amounts can accumulate on roads and cause dangerous driving conditions due to snow covered roads. The hazardous conditions could impact the Thursday morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by going to newengland511.org

area.areaDesc: Cheshire; Merrimack; Southern Grafton; Sullivan; Western And Central Hillsborough
